content: The docs for the repeat tactic say "The Std library provides repeat' which repeats separately in each subgoal." But there seems to be a repeat' out of the box in Lean/Meta/Tactic/Repeat. Are the docs out of date or are they different tactics with the same name?
It seems to be out of date â€” it was upstreamed in lean4#3305
Francisco Giordano has marked this topic as resolved.
